text: Ivan's Childhood (), sometimes released as My Name Is Ivan is a 1962 Russian World War II drama movie directed by Andrei Tarkovsky and is based on the 1957 short story Ivan by Vladimir Bogomolov. It stars Nikolai Burlyaev, Valentin Zubkov, Evgeny Zharikov, Nikolai Grinko and was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1962 drama movies Category:1962 war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Andrei Tarkovsky
